statements: SELECT post_id, post_text, likes FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_image, comments FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_text, post_image FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE shares < 50;
SELECT post_text, shares FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes FROM social_media_posts WHERE shares > 50 ORDER BY post_text ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_image FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes < 50 AND comments > 10 ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC;
SELECT post_id, comments, shares FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_text ILIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY post_id ASC, shares DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes, shares FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes > 50 AND (shares > 20 OR comments > 5) ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT content, likes FROM posts WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, content, likes FROM posts WHERE comments < 50 ORDER BY likes ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, content, image_url FROM posts WHERE likes < 50 AND comments > 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_image_url, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE joined_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT post_id, user_id, engagement_type FROM post_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY comments_count DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE joined_date >= '2021-01-01' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC , user_id DESC
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM post_engagement GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_engagements > 5
SELECT post_content, post_image_url FROM posts INNER JOIN users ON posts.post_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, text FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, comments FROM posts ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT post_id, text, image_url FROM posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, text, image_url FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50;
SELECT p.text, u.username FROM posts p JOIN post_comments pc ON p.post_id = pc.post_id JOIN users u ON pc.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT p.text, COUNT(pl.like_id) AS total_likes FROM posts p LEFT JOIN post_likes pl ON p.post_id = pl.post_id GROUP BY p.text ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, text_content, likes FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, image_url, likes, shares FROM posts ORDER BY shares DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE joined_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_content, created_at FROM comments WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, text_content, likes FROM posts WHERE shares < 50 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, image_url, likes, shares FROM posts WHERE likes > shares ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments JOIN users ON comments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT likes.post_id, COUNT(likes.user_id) as like_count, COUNT(shares.user_id) as share_count FROM likes JOIN shares ON likes.post_id = shares.post_id GROUP BY likes.post_id HAVING like_count > share_count ORDER BY like_count DESC;
